title: Ticket #1720: condor_gethostbyaddr_ipv6() fails on Mac OS X 10.4
description:
The failure of the lib_auth_config test on the trunk (and 7.5.4 branch) that is consistently happening under x86_macos_10.4 appears to be caused by the ipv6 changes.

In condor_gethostbyaddr_ipv6(), if I add the following line, things work: 

sinaddr.sin_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);

Without the above line, getnameinfo() returns EAI_FAMILY under OS X 10.4. My laptop (OS X 10.5) works without the above line, even when running the same binary that fails under OS X 10.4.

Not all platforms even have a sin_len member of sockaddr_in. Apparently this is a 4.4BSD thing.
